title: How do we get there (investments)?
description: You can explore here the means of implementation and support. This is explored in terms of required investments for a low-carbon world, but also in divestment for unabated fossils. All these parameters can be explored with full or reduced availibility of carbon dioxide removal (CDR) technologies
